title: Sumatran Tiger
author: knightinghoul
pages:
As you traverse the
rainforests of
Sumatra... you
encounter a Sumatran
Tiger!

The Sumatran Tiger
is the smallest
subspecies of tiger,
and it also has the
darkest coloration.


As its name suggests,
it is exclusively found
on the island of
Sumatra.

Unfortunately, due to
habitat loss and
illegal hunting, the
Sumatran Tiger is
Critically Endangered.

:(
